verbs.description: French President Emmanuel Macron [V: is] seeking to take the lead of the European brigade against U.S. President Donald Trump at the summit of the Group of Seven wealthy countries in Canada .

[ARG0: French President Emmanuel Macron] is [V: seeking] [ARG1: to take the lead of the European brigade against U.S. President Donald Trump at the summit of the Group of Seven wealthy countries in Canada] .

[ARG0: French President Emmanuel Macron] is seeking to [V: take] [ARG1: the lead of the European brigade against U.S. President Donald Trump] [ARGM-LOC: at the summit of the Group of Seven wealthy countries in Canada] .
